The project is about providing camera solutions for UAV projects as telemetry over OSD and/or camera control, etc.
As the project is based on Arduino, it can be hacked to fit many other applications.
<br><br>
==MinimOSD - The first product based on ArduCAM OSD Project==

http://arducam-osd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/MinimOSD.jpg

<br>
*[minimosd MinimOSD:]* is a product board from DIYDrones and 3DRobotics which provides OSD telemetry out-of-the-box to [http://code.google.com/p/ardupilot-mega/wiki/home ArduPilot Mega].

MinimOSD is the perfect solution for attaching FPV cameras to your drones.
It adds telemetry data to the video signal coming from the camera aboard by reading [http://qgroundcontrol.org/mavlink/start MAVLink] messages from !ArduPilot's telemetry port.
